Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Our room was missing a coffee machine or any tea coffee making facilities I had to call reception numerous times until housekeeping finally brought something for us Other than that we really enjoyed our stay at Maison Albar and would definitely recommend
Positive_Review: Great location with easy access to saint lazare station and walking distance to cafes and restaurants The hotel itself is very modern and clean The bed was very comfy and considering the hotel is on a busy road it was still very quiet The room was well equipped even with slippers and robes The staff were more than happy to help with directions and recommendations We also made full use of the complimentary sweets at reception

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Nothing was lacking at all with the possible exception of offering a breakfast
Positive_Review: The staff was wonderful helping us find public transportation and directions for everywhere we wanted to go The hotel was very nice clean and well appointed It was definitely more of a luxury hotel We did not eat there but are very happy with our stay

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Nothing I could think of
Positive_Review: The sheets were clean crisp Japanese style toilet was great Having a coffee machine in the room was real bonus for coffee lovers like us Perfect location too

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Our stay at Maison Albar Hotel Paris Opera Diamond was amazing We stayed for 3 nights the room was beautiful especially the bathroom Staff were very helpful and the facilities were excellent We were given a room on the top floor with excellent views of Saint Lazare Train Station The location was perfect within walking distance of all the main attractions Felt very safe walking around the area

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Incredibly helpful staff that were multi lingual Great location close to metro and walking distance to Arc de triumphe and Eiffel tower Would definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: There was not enough english tv channels There was only BBC news available You have to pay to watch movies
Positive_Review: There were no croissants for breakfast considering this is France

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff at Maison Albar were friendly and welcoming Upon arrival we received an upgrade to a beautiful suite which was fabulous with wonderful city views Felix from the bar looked after us very well always ensuring our glasses were topped up

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: There wasn t anything I didn t like
Positive_Review: Loved the location Next to an underground station Restaurants and cafe so close Hotel breakfast was good and bed and pillows were very comfortable also the bathroom was well appointed and lit

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Nothing could have been better
Positive_Review: The staff were fabulous warm welcome when we arrived at the hotel where someone showed us to our room helped us with many other things such as helping us planning the day to the Eiffel Tower The room was really clean and the bed was really comfy

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The room was a bit small for a Junior suite The mini bar was so expensive I was able to buy 6 bottles at the market nearby for the price of one at the hotel
Positive_Review: Great shower comfortable bed good food and coffee shops next door very close to metro good selection of music channels on TV friendly service very good decor the wifi worked at a good speed

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Had to stay an extra night and regular rates were much higher than Booking com rates
Positive_Review: This was a familiar location for us Good restaurants nearby Hotel breakfast was good and had a very good selection including American breakfast items Trains and Metro within a block of hotel from which one can get virtually anywhere The room was very nice indeed the bathroom was fabulous and it had great TV with many English channels Staff was amazing Will stay here again if opportunity presents

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Not inexpensive but for this standard in Paris to be expected
Positive_Review: Very modern restoration of a grand building of 1923 Excellent facilities in every respect Staff were friendly and courteous No complaints over anything The atmosphere was of peace and calm efficiency

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful The room itself was quite spacious and comfortable The area around the hotel is quite busy and lively

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Only problem we encountered was that there were three of us in suite All toiletries and towels were laid out for three but the mugs and amount of coffee tea etc was only laid out for two Reception and housekeeping staff were always ready to supply extra of the above on request A small complaint which in no way affected the enjoyment of our stay
Positive_Review: Hotel and suite were spotlessly clean Suite was extremely comfortable as were all other areas of the hotel All staff were extremely helpful and polite

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: It was the second time I stayed at this place and for the second time we had an issue with warm water Last time the boiler was down and we only had cold water but we expected it to be a one time issue This time there was warm water but it was only warm lukewarm I like to take a hot shower to relax muscles after walking around the whole day in Paris but it seems that the boiler can t manage to produce enough hot water for everyone
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is quite good being close to the department stores Printemps etc The rooms are stylish and well equipped even with a coffee machine

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Breakfast was not that good if compared to the price must be good The price is very high and does not fit the location
Positive_Review: Good hotel and good clean so well from center to hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Quicker service waited quite some time when requesting items
Positive_Review: Abit delayed when requesting milk Water from shower head not always hot the hand shower only had very hot water the settings on toilet didn t work the music in shower very limited to 6 songs price abit steep but overall lovely room with lovely location I will return

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Upon arriving they said to me at the reception desk that they should have to charge in advance my credit card for 50 euros extra per day just in case that I get a service without pay They also said that my credit card will not be charged if I will not use the amount I found this insulting and unproffessional After all I booked a prepaid bed and breakfast accomodation just to be sure that I didn t have to pay anything extra Not to mention that after this treatment even if I wanted to buy anything at all the last thing I should do is to give the hotel even a single cent extra I would rather go a mile away and get it outside from the hotel
Positive_Review: The location is perfect Staff very helpful The hotel in general is excellent

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: The staff was very knowledgeable and extremely helpful with the planning of our site seeing They were kind and welcoming from the moment we walked in all the way until we left Going forward I will always stay at this hotel when I come to Paris Excellent location walking distance to several stations great food and restaurants open late right around the corner huge shopping venue nearby plus the room was perfection

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The lady serving us at breakfast was very unfriendly unhelpful and mostly in a bad mood and being exposed to her early in the day wasn t a great start to a moring on vacation Even though the food itself was lovely we opted to eat breakfast somewhere else on the days that she served breakfast
Positive_Review: For Paris the rooms are extra large the bed and linen was super comfortable and we loved the Japanese toilet in the modernly decorated bathroom Our room had a good view too I would absolutely recommend this hotel to loved ones

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No iron and ironing board in the room as when we have to rush for customer meetings this saves time as hotel laundry will be too slow
Positive_Review: Clean comfortable and spacious for a European hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The room was smaller than expected as we got an executive suite and it didn t seem much bigger than a double room Still amazingly decorated room and balcony
Positive_Review: The staff were lovely and the decor was amazing Loved the location as it was close to everything by cab and even somethings walking distance

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: We were given the key to a room already occupied and our key opened the door to a room already with someone else s possessions in there This was fixed by giving us another room unoccupied But later the same thing happened us when someone was given a key to our room Bad organisation from staff
Positive_Review: Like the decor and location was really good

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The only thing we didn t like twas the cocktail we had on the Saturday night wasn t great to be fair
Positive_Review: Over all the hotel was excellent and wish I stay there another night

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Apple TV did not work and we also had to connect to the wifi from another room which didn t bother us but was strange Would have liked to try the hotel restaurant but it was just too expensive
Positive_Review: This hotel is beautiful a real treat The staff were very friendly and made the whole check in process very smooth The room was very comfortable and clean and it was always a perfect temperature The staff were also very responsive when a mistake was made and worked very quickly to resolve it

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Very small room No Airconditioning no fan Room was terribly hot staff was not helpful at all The location is very busy and it s right next to the train station
Positive_Review: It was nicely decorated

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The fact the concierge asked for a tip with his hand and also walked my girlfriend out the hotel around the corner and asked her to change English money for euros and tried to con her for extra That is not 5 star Also the hotel said there would be flowers in the room as requested but there were non yet still charged These two experiences dampened the stay a little
Positive_Review: The reception staff were helpful and the location was fantastic for getting around Paris The hotel was clean and quiet The room was great and bed very comfy

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: On the second night of my stay at the Hotel the alarm went off in the hotel at around midnight all guests had to leave their rooms in complete darkness as the electricity switches had tripped Ran in the dark with our pj s to the foyer as we thought the hotel was burning or even worse maybe a terrorist attack Waited a whole hour and a half in the cold and dark before we were told that the smoke signal went off and that had triggerred the alarm and cut off the electricity supply Only one hotel staff member was on duty to assist which he was unable to do We were locked out of our rooms We only got back to our rooms at 1 30 All we were told was that they were sorry no compensation or even a written apology from the hotel management Quiet scary as the guy on duty did not have the situation under control No proper disaster management protocols are put into place PATHETIC FOR 5 STAR Wonder how and who rates you 5 star
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The service is not as good as it used to be before the rebrand Many of the original front of house staff who were extremely friendly and helpful have gone unfortunately Also the staff seem unaware of the booking com payment policies
Positive_Review: Location is great and size of the rooms is good compared to other hotels in Paris They ve also upgraded the general facilities as a result of the recent refurbishment

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Limited TV channels The fire alarm went off in the middle of the night the electricity shut off and all guests were in reception until the early hours There was no communication from the staff and no one was aware that it was safe to return to the room Day staff were very unapologetic upon check out
Positive_Review: Great location Beautiful hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel with friendly and helpful staff Opposite the metro and near shops cafes restaurants Good location to explore the sights Even has an M S Food next door

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Bed and pillow
Positive_Review: Staying at level 2 without Aircon and have to open the window and sleep is a pain check out early morning 6am and the staff doesn t know their system well and took 30mins for check out and can t release the deposit immediately upon check in the staff didn t inform us about city tax we only know when we upon check out we didnt go for any alcohol at bar service and the staff wanna charge us for that they waived off after a long dispute and pillow is terrible

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The Wifi was not so good It kept breaking down and the room was facing the street which was noisy but that is part of the Paris atmosphere Due to the location and busy street you need to call the taxi at least 15 mins before you need to leave
Positive_Review: I absolutely loved the property The cleanliness the decor the location the friendly staff and service esp Tariq the bell boy The ambience was great I just did not realise that the hotel had a fitness room Next time I will try it I really loved my stay and I will definitely be back I only managed to have the breakfast on one day but it was perfect In terms of comfort cleanliness design decor location service this really is one of my favourite hotels and I have traveled around the world

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: We asked for help from the reception to recommend a restaurant for dinner however she never get back to us A bit disappointed
Positive_Review: Great location English speaking staffs make things enjoyable Next to the station pharmacy and lots of restaurants Wifi is only available for 2 login so if you need to work on extra devices considering there 2 of you in the room there will be a problem

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The deco of the lobby looks like a night club
Positive_Review: Loved the hotel amazing location Very clean and most of the staff members were very helpful Maybe the d cor could be more classy and the rooms are spacious compared to other hotels in Paris

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Lighting in the halls and rooms wasn t great Could do with better lighting
Positive_Review: Bed was super comfy and staff were very helpful when we needed it split into a double

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: They need another elevator Sometimes the elevator was held up and I had to take the stairs to the 5th floor
Positive_Review: The hotel was totally BEAUTIFUL I loved it The staff was excellent They had amazing breakfast My room was so GORGEOUS

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The service is poor Housekeeping services sucks They forgot to give us bath towels didnt clean the room properly Housekeeping kept knocking on the doors in the mornings although the please do not disturb sign on was placed on
Positive_Review: Bed and room was comfortable

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: not much maybe Lobby area decoration a bit overloaded
Positive_Review: corner room new 2016 design was just amazing I could overlook the whole place in front of Gare St Lazare steam bath built within the shower as special highlight huge room all nice and modern with nespresso machine Room was an upgrade however great breakfast with huge selection and fresh juices

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The only downside we would like to point out is the room temperature The room was a bit cold during our stay
Positive_Review: We were upgraded to a deluxe room and it seems that it has only slight differences from a standard The bathroom is really great nice spacious shower The room is also spacious for Paris standards The hotel is located next to Gare Saint Lazare which gives you an awesome position to use metro and move around town We will definitely come back to this hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The only thing that I can comment on the location though it s not that far from the main attraction places
Positive_Review: Every detail at this boutique hotel is looked after carefully and this makes everything in it a great experience

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Can t fault a thing so pleased with everything Best hotel in Paris highly highly recommend
Positive_Review: The whole hotel experience was amazing best hotel we ve ever stayed in and we ve stayed in some lovely ones Chic glamorous and amazing attention to detail from a lovely email offering us to drop our bags off early and they d have our room ready as early as possible The bathroom sound system and mood lighting in the bathroom has the wow factor The bed was unbelievable and the staff were so warm and welcoming they couldn t do ebough for you The cleanliness was second to non Amazing value for money made our stay in Paris so special would highly highly recommend to anyone I would also 100 stay here again Amazing experience Loveliest hotel I ve ever stayed in

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Aircon not working so became very hot in the room even in December
Positive_Review: Great location Friendly multilingual staff Spacious room Great wet room bathroom Very peaceful

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Coffeepot is broken in my room
Positive_Review: Nice cleanliness good location And I love the hotel manager in night lobby I m deeply inpressed with your kindness Thank you very much

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: There was no gym despite being advertised as part of the hotel s facilities which I found out on the day
Positive_Review: Friendly excellent service central location coffee in the room

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: To the Owners All the staff of Best Western Opera Diamond Hotel My Dear friends I would like every one of you on personal basases for your attention kindness professionalism and hospitality Actually you are excellent and amazing hotel I will recommend you to every body my family friends I will be always with you My best regards Dr Reda Rasslan
Positive_Review: To the Owners All the staff of Best Western Opera Diamond Hotel My Dear friends I would like every one of you on personal basases for your attention kindness professionalism and hospitality Actually you are excellent and amazing hotel I will recommend you to every body my family friends I will be always with you My best regards Dr Reda Rasslan

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Our room was stuffy The room was very noisy all night as it fronted the street and we needed to open the windows
Positive_Review: Good sized very clean room Big comfortable bed and pillows Windows that opened Good value

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: There was supposed to be evening entertainment but we saw none Bar closed on Sunday
Positive_Review: We were on the 3rd floor at the front the soundproofing was so good we heard very little noise The Lazare train station beside the hotel contains super shops and an excellent restaurant Loved the room and the bath room was beautiful and so well equipped even a very elaborate toilet the operation of which we stayed well clear of Would love to revisit

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Room could of been a touch bigger the hot breakfast was cold and space when I visited
Positive_Review: The comfort of the bed the shower and the staff were very accommodating and helpfull

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: I loved my stay at this lovely hotel The location was superb awesome cafes and restaurants are nearby Also the train station is very close as well The area around the hotel is lively during the day I actually went to the champs elysees by walking for almost 25 minutes which was not so bad As for the room i had the double one which was perfect for us as a couple The furniture is elegant and the bed was very comfortable As for the bathroom it was the best part of the experience because it was very clean modern and had an awesome walk in shower The water pressure was so good as well It deserves to be a 5 stars hotel and the hotel management are actually doing some renovations to make that happen I for one was not annoyed by the renovation works Ask for a room that is besides the court yard for the quietness and peacefulness I will surely book again if i come to Paris for another trip Oh and yes the staff are nice and very helpful when needed

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Construction outside the room we had to step over workers to get in and out of our room
Positive_Review: The front desk staff are excellent friendly and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Construction outside and in currently to convert the hotel to a 5 star already gets 5 stars from us
Positive_Review: The location was excellent for easy access to trains Metro and buses to all the best sites customer service was exceptional and staff was able to assist in English very well

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The old rooms are a bit too dark and creepy request for the new rooms to have the ultimate experience here these new rooms are well lit and bright for those who like a properly illuminated room space Also didn t like that the hotel outsourced kitchen services only breakfast is served in house lunch and dinner will be ordered by the hotel on your behalf externally
Positive_Review: Location was great staff was great too great value for money and not to forget the room upgrade twice it was such a great gesture as we had complained our room was too dark the room was changed with an upgrade from deluxe to junior suite withou5t any fuss at all

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had a truly incredible and unforgettable stay in Paris at the Best Western Diamond Opera Hotel We were upgraded to the Diamond Suite the best room in the hotel at no extra cost which offered spectacular balcony views of the city spa facilities nespresso machine and a very large spacious room Contemporary sleek and luxurious interiors throughout and together with exceptional customer service helpful and polite staff made our stay as relaxing and comfortable as possible Outstanding attention to detail and final touches from the high tech touch screen climate control sauna spa lighting and music settings Japanese heated toilet to the delicious complementary macaroons Absolutely perfect location easily within walking distance to the top sites in Paris A stunning 5 holiday in pure luxury The best hotel we have ever stayed in will be highly recommending it

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very good service A young lady names Christina sorry I can t recall assist us to reserve tables in tour d argent me and my wife have a wonderful birthday dinner thanks to her Everything is perfect

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Corridor too dark and narrow Can be a fire hazard
Positive_Review: Excellent location room which they upgraded me was bright and clean with a smart TV Good wifi connection

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Breakfast was nice especially the croissants Although suggest getting up early as the cooked breakfast items were gone by 9 45 Apart from this we really enjoyed our stay here and would most definitely stay here again
Positive_Review: Lovely decor throughout the hotel Lovely and clean shower was fab and the large bed was so comfortable Staff were all helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed and pillows were very comfortable The bathroom was clean and large enough especially with a separate toilet The staff were very helpful throughout our stay Overall our stay was good value for money

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: nothing it was perfect
Positive_Review: gorgeous place to stay would highly recommend it staff was amazing and the hotel was the best i have ever stayed even put rose petals on are bed and gave us macoroons which made it extra special for my boyfriends birthday

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: There was construction being done at the location so a little loud at times Overall GREAT stay
Positive_Review: The location was excellent the staff was helpful Rooms were very nice posh just a little small

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: We felt that the full breakfast is quite expensive per person but I think the express breakfast offers an excellent alternative for those travellers who are on the go We availed of this option the quality of this as well as the service was excellent
Positive_Review: it was so kind of the hotel staff to upgrade our room as it was our Wedding Anniversary The treats left out for us in on our room on arrival was a very thoughtful gesture also The service was excellent particularly the reception and breakfast staff The express breakfast suited us perfectly and was really good value

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The staff made this stay easy They held my bag all day after check out They upgraded me to a better room The room was great much better than the 5 star hotel I stayed in for the rest of my trip

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: recently refurbished but very poor quality lights in bathroom did not work no extractor fan for shower ventilation in room not working or does not go cool enough fridge not cold enough new lights in hallway hanging from wall and already out of order plus their rack rates were ridiculously expensive lucky we got a decent rate or we would not have booked
Positive_Review: nice hotel and good prices good location friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: I did find that the breakfast was a bit on the pricey side for what was included Therefore i opted not to include with my booking instead visited different cafes that are located outside of the hotel every morning which was alot cheaper
Positive_Review: Absolutely loved staying in this hotel during my visit to Paris Literally no complaints whatsoever Fresh bedding on my super kingsize bed and nice smelling toiletries everyday The decor was beautiful which was a massive bonus aesthetically The hotel was central to all the major attractions i was interested in with the underground Metro just a few minutes walk from the hotel

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Supposed to be spa but that didn t exist that was the reason for selecting this hotel above others Not value for the price paid
Positive_Review: Good location for metro access

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The courtyard or restaurant wasn t trading accessible during our stay which just means we ll have to return when it does
Positive_Review: The decor the location and the staff was stunning perfect and super pleasant

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: All day room service should be available Couldn t see no bar as the hotel was getting refurbished and was not told when booked Door need to be solid and sound proof as we could hear everything
Positive_Review: Bed was comfy

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Our room was next to the staircase The door to the staircase didn t have a silencer or slow shutting mechanism so kept on banging shut everytime someone went through it Made sleeping difficult we were woken up at about 5am by it Told staff about it in the morning 8am and they just asked if we had reported the problem to a member of staff Also 2 of our rooms on the 3rd floor had no WiFi
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The check in was a nightmare we were initially put into the wrong room and when we argued about the false promises of the website in regards to our suite the front desk told us there was no room of that description despite having the confirmation of Executive Suite in hand Also there was lots of noisy construction which disrupted our mornings No apologies were made as was no warning to said work Disappointing for the price we paid
Positive_Review: Two staff members stood out in particular Nobel Fatou without them the start of our Paris vacation would have been very disappointing The chromotherapy shower was also divine Close to shops sights and transport which was handy

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Location is good there is close to Saint lazare and a marks and spencer food market There was just nothing pretty about the location no atmosphere with Parisian barrsaries etc
Positive_Review: Good but not great Lovely hotel nicely decorated with an awesome rain shower Bed was comfy and strong air conditioning was a must and a God send during Paris heatwave

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Highly overpriced for what it offers Designer hotel but really not offering anything special Breakfast was ok but given the price I would have expected much better The room was very small and the air conditioning did not work Given outside was almost 30 degrees it resulted in a horrible experience
Positive_Review: Good location easy to reach

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Housekeeping wasnt up to the mark Water glasses and tea cups in room were not replaced daily even if they were used
Positive_Review: Location is fab Starbucks and Mark Spencer food is little same block as building Lots of bus stops close by lots of eateries too

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: The breakfast menu was repetitive and considering the price I paid should have been included there was a lot of noise due to building works but it stopped in the early evenings but in all it was a beautiful stay
Positive_Review: My room was very nice the bed was comfortable the hospitality was very polite

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: As a traveler I have a large experience in hotels Well Now gotta be strict and honest on the nons as a friendly staff does not makes an hotel 1 staff knock my door at 1204 I suppose to let me aware I was going over my check out time What WELL NOOO No 2 cleaner open door without notice for room services Not as good if like me you enjoy wondering naked 3 cleaner use same lift as clients therefore lift and coredors are often pack with laundry 4 No tooth brush or paste 5 breakfast if you book direct with them is free of charge otherwise 23 or other prices on booking com I DO NOT RECOMMEND YOU ANY very poor breakfast not much variety for price the home made cakes were not with a fresh feeling 6 It is indeed an boutique hotel very small and the lounge area probably is the entrance lobby 7 The garden that shows on the pictures is no longer exists Instead a place where is probably in restoration 8 Noise from construction work at 8am Would be kind to be worn about 9 You can hear and feel everytime cleaners or neigbour bang the door VERY LOUD 10 Room is dark 11 shower looks good but water will go all over the bathroom turning all very messy hard and extremely dangerous to walk 12 No spa but I was aware I don t know either will stay again however it was not a bad experience just bits and pieces and areas of improving its hard to be perfect Would suggest go and judge for yourself I m surely not regretted Good luck
Positive_Review: Well I m one of those freaks who read all reviews before takind an decision so stay tune and I will give you the honest ever Unware of check in times I arrived at 12pm a very pleasant gentleman although check in starts at 2pm arraged a room for me and upgraded to deluxe room same gentleman gave me a map of the city and wrote down for me places nearby to see and to eat he than helped me to my room and explain that I can have access to films for free and cofee 2 Breakfast until 10pm but they let you in even if your late and always replenishing food The Nutella and lil glasses compotes is the best of the breakfast part Staff very friendly helpful and present at breakfast keeping place clean and replenished 3 Saint Lazard is just very good location and great access shopping center 1min walk I recommend you to walk as all is very close in Paris astonishing views at every conner great for photos and explore I walk with no gps or map and bumped to Eifel Tower and others landmarks Take uber over night as it is very cheap be aware that same will cancel your trip for the fact you speak English and they can t understand you 4 friendly staff again they printed my booking for Moulin Rouge 5 I m very picky when it takes to bathroom as to be modern looking brand new and extremely clean with SHOWER It reach my expectations clearly Free toiletries is a must on a 4 star 6 decoration was quirky 7 very easy to find 8 they will store your luggage if you fancy a walk after your check out Extremely recommend it 9 Wifi works well 10 staff speaks perfect English

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: to inform us that the breakfast was included as we did not know and therefore did not eat the breakfast
Positive_Review: The room was very good and confortable and we aprreciated the upgrade to a suite room the 2nd night to compensate for the big noise we experienced on the first morning because of refurbishment works

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Work being carried out in the hotel meant very dusty in communal areas but staff did well to minimise disruption for guests Showers don t have curtain or screen so whole bathroom floor becomes a tray
Positive_Review: Handy bar across the road for breakfast at 7euros per person Location of metro just across road Good size rooms

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Foyer hallways and stairs quite dark Given poor instructions on internet access we asked for help they said they would just be a minute fifteen minutes later still no assistance Then we found a free computer way around the corner why not offer us that in the mean time Breakfast way overpriced
Positive_Review: Bed and room great Modern bathroom

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Wifi is limited to a set number of devices with no ability to remove devices
Positive_Review: Very modern looks great with very good room facilities and very polite and accommodating staff Amazing location ideal for tourists

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: CAMERA IN THE BATHROOM See last sentences It seemed like our room had only recently been renovated The air con didn t seem to work at all and when I put my hand over the vent to check for air flow it fell off the wall and almost hit me in the head Upon inspection it was stuck to the wall with 2 sided tape The intercom handset in the bathroom was broken and almost falling apart There was a large dark rectangle in the lower half of the bathroom mirror which seemed to serve no purpose I thought it may be a monitor to display a clock and outside ambient temps that was currently not working When I enquired about it the receptionist told me it was a decoration I think this is unlikely Further inspection of the mirror showed that it wasn t even fastened to the wall properly the entire lower right corner was sitting away from the wall When my inquisitive eyes reached the top of the mirror I was surprised beyond belief to find what looked like haven t confirmed yet a pin hole camera It was a small object about 1 5mm width A cube shape with 1 side that was convex smooth and rounded 3 wires coming out of the cube extended down behind the mirror and into the wall It had been carefully fastened to the back of the mirror in the centre of the top edge with 2 sided tape The tape had been placed over the wires about 3cm from the camera and the camera had been angled so as to look directly into the space where anyone standing in front of the mirror would be When I enquired at reception they told me it s nothing Yes that s a quote I went back to the room and yanked the thing up as hard as I could and stuffed it all behind the mirror
Positive_Review: This hotel was interesting with its mock diamonds inlaid into most of the furniture Almost everything else is made to sparkle too

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Hotel is currently being renovated as is the building next to it But actually sounds from the hotel renovation are the worst They wake you up from 8AM They are taking place at the courtyard which means you get drilling and all other noises right when you eat breakfast downstairs Oh and the breakfast That deserves whole another story Avoid it at all costs There are some good products there crepes and freshly baked buns but the stuff serving it is just a nightmare I had to ask every single day for either plates forks knives buns because NOBODY was checking if everything is present And I ve always received the worst coffee ever I mean after 15 20 minutes of waiting for it when they didn t forgot to add milk to it And it s from a Nespresso machine How can you ruin that
Positive_Review: Location is perfect Rooms are very comfortable Cleaning service was superb But that s about it Very helpful stuff at reception

Hotel_Name: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Op ra Diamond
Negative_Review: Mentioned above
Positive_Review: The staff was Amazing I loved everyone and they all made me feel at home and like family My room was lovely but I would not want a room on the street by the elevator and stairs It was noisy and I did report it to the desk but they could not movement until my last night So I I never moved Not their fault Loved the French Decir Lobby Bar Breakfadt and location of hotel I cannot stress how wonderful the Staff was I loved everyone

Negative_Review: Everything was wonderful As I mentioned if you have more than two people in your party a larger room would be advisable
Positive_Review: Amazing property in a great location For those in America used to the stereotypical view of a Best Western property the Best Western Premier properties are a complete 180 from what we re used to The hotel was modern clean incredibly well positioned and with a staff that was accommodating friendly and patient We had a deluxe room with a very comfortable bed this coming from someone with a Tempur Pedic at home and great modern bathroom The room was a little cramped for two people but frankly we only spent time there in the evenings to rest If you have more than two people I would suggest getting a larger room Overall I would gladly recommend and would stay again at this property There is also a taxi stand about a block away which made getting around easy in addition to a Marks and Spencer food hall on one side of the hotel and Starbucks around the corner there was always a place to grab a quick snack before heading out
